name: PHANTASM (itch) (Arif Ahmed)
description:
This is my first third-person shooter military-style: Phantasm. This game has helped my journey to become a games developer because there were bumps in the road where it was difficult for me to design, build, test and release Phantasm but in the end, I came up with this gameplay. 

I developed Phantasm on Unity where you see I programmed and added drones, and added third-person movement for both my player and enemies animations. 

The goal of Phantasm is to turn off the main generators and escape. 

Controls: W (Walk Forward), S (Walk Backwards), A (Walk Left), D (Walk Right), Shift (Run), Spacebar (Jump), Left Click (Shoot), Right Click (Aim), M (Show Objective), P (Pause), F (Find Key), Q (Turn off Computer & Generators).

PS: There are glitches to my player and enemies' movement animations but I wanted to release this game as this is far as I can go with this game!
